description: Yes, there are still green bubbles — and security compromises that Apple could have avoided.
title: Apple improved green bubble chats with iOS 18. But not enough.

description: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy shared a message announcing the new return-to-office policy, telling employees they will be expected to be in the office five days a week starting Jan. 2.
title: Amazon tells staff to return to office five days a week

description: TikTok’s ban date is still Jan.19. As lawsuits continue to play out, here is what to know about challenges, the law and what you should know as a user.
title: Yes, TikTok could still be banned. Here’s what you should know.

description: Even as both the Harris and Trump presidential campaigns have leaned heavily into TikTok to reach younger voters, the weeks are ticking down before the wildly popular app is banned in the US under a new law that has drawn bipartisan backing. TikTok is set to present its case to a DC appeals court on Monday morning for why the company believes the looming ban is illegal.
title: TikTok fights ban in court as Harris and Trump campaigns embrace the app
